title: The Pharaohâ€™s Concubine - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Ancient Times   Fated Lovers   Female Protagonist   God Protagonist   Male Protagonist
author: Vivibear
description:
Before he became the great pharaoh, and when she was just a little known healer, fate intervened and bound them together.

For the love of Nefertari, the sun rose from the east.

Even as the time passed, as years turned to centuries. Even as the lovers had long died and had turned to dust.

The story of their love defied the flow of time and continues to be passed down from generation to generation.

Until the end of time.>
